content: this sweet crochet blankie is a comforting gift for any child stitched in red heart super saver stripes the blanket and ears of the character are made with this multicolored yarn while the head is created in a solid color working in rounds you ll practice single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet and more you ll love the unique look the yarn gives you with every granny square blankie you make materials red heart® super saver® stripes™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m main color mc true blue 3962 3 balls or 506 yds/460 m red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a light blue 0381 1 ball or 55 yds/50 m measurements blanket approx 24 61 cm square bunny s head approx 3-3½ 7 5-9 cm diameter
